ygData.subject: Re: help me please
ygData.msgSnippet: thanks for the empathy and good wishes:) I can understand the reasoning behind what you said alot more than what I was told of illegial activites like selling
ygData.messageBody:
thanks for the empathy and good wishes:) I can
understand the reasoning behind what you said alot more than
what I was told of illegial activites like selling on
ebay/ still I think <br>exceptions should be made for
people who missed<br>a move because of rl problems.
Also, I understand and agree with your comments on
people who pl and twink without learning how to play the
game, it can be very frustrationg to get in a group
with total idiots who have no clue how to assist so
that chanters can mezz, and who target the creatures
the chanter just mezzed leaving something else
hitting the cleric or chanter, I <br>play both classes so
I get it no matter what I do.<br>Most mobs go for
chanters and clerics first..they just hate us, and we get
very bitter when we die due to idiots unmezzing and
not assisting all the time.
